name: The Last Machine Before the World Ends
name_original: The Last Machine Before the World Ends
description:
Here is our entry for Ludum Dare 36 !

The theme was : Ancient Technology.

It's a 2D reflex/puzzle game where you have to activate modules of an old machine in time to save the world… Will you succeed ??

Controls : mouse only
Made with : Unity, Photoshop, Ableton Live
